Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Exempts realtors from the prohibition against placing unsolicited telemarketing sales calls during a state of emergency or disaster emergency
Summary: Exempts realtors from the prohibition against placing unsolicited telemarketing sales calls during a state of emergency or disaster emergency; allows real estate brokers, associate real estate brokers, real estate salesmen, real estate saleswomen or office managers to knowingly make unsolicited telemarketing sales calls during a declared state of emergency or disaster emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to exempting realtors from the prohibition against placing unsolicited telemarketing sales calls during a state of emergency or disaster emergency
